Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and high-quality materials, it's truly a standout item in its category. Given its exceptional value and performance, I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. I am offering this product to you for $180, reflecting its true worth and the benefits it provides. I'm confident you'll find it to be an excellent investment. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. Looking forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
